alert.note: Alert for Ingham; Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:26PM EDT until June 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR JACKSON AND INGHAM COUNTIES... At 525 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mason to 6 miles southwest of Vandercook Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Mason... Williamston... Leslie... Stockbridge... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Aurelius... Onondaga... Norvell... Bunker Hill... Webberville... Concord... Horton... Parma... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
